name: Lord of the Jungle
overview: When Lord was taken into the care of the jungle’s great apes he was only a small baby. He didn’t realise he was any different from those were looking after him, but now, after 18 years living in the forest, he finally meets other people . . . Find out what becomes of the young Lord in Lord of the Jungle which features a challenging puzzle game, cartoon video and an easy-to-use virtual colouring book. The PSX game includes: - Cartoon film - Jigsaw puzzles - Colouring game
